lead_paragraph: There is no magic button, even if the correlation between Mike Sullivan's deft attempts to a get player's attention and that player almost immediately elevating his game is unmistakable.

headline.print_headline: Sullivan Pushing All the Right Buttons for Penguins
headline.main: Sullivan Pushing All the Right Buttons for Penguins

snippet: There is no magic button, even if the correlation between Mike Sullivan's deft attempts to a get player's attention and that player almost immediately elevating his game is unmistakable....
